body.p: Select the name of the bone that is being described.
The supports facial structures, encloses and protects the brain.
The provide protection for the organs of the upper body.
The permits mechanical stability for the body and protect the spinal cord.
The provides attachment for many (not all) ribs.

response.feedback: Correct. The cranium is part of the skull.
Incorrect. The mandible is part of the skull.
Incorrect. The vertebrae is part of the vertebral column.
Incorrect. The ribs are located in the thoracic cage.
Incorrect. The sternum is part of the thoracic cage.

part.hint: It is located in the head.
